The video was captured by Reuters report: providing visual evidence of the incident.
White House Principal Deputy Press Secre: Pierre confirmed that the video showed Biden falling on the stairs of Air Force One and stated that he was uninjured in the fall.
The video was taken on March 19: 2021, at Joint Base Andrews in Maryland, before Biden's departure to visit the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC) and meet with Asian American leaders.
Historical references were made to simil: S. presidents, such as Gerald Ford and Ronald Reagan, who also slipped and fell on the stairs of Air Force One.
